item.title: git_stuff
item.description: Finally got a Github repository set up for this project. It took me a little bit to figure out how to use the site. Making a commit and pulling it into the main branch from the terminal took a bit of research to figure out. Turns out, Github depreciated the username and password feature for utilizing the command-line to create push and pull requests. The new system requires a user to create a unique token that essentially functions as a password for authorizing actions.
